TopicTitle: Couldn't help thinking of wasted dV...

Articles.Content: Really, look at all that wasted fuel

Yeah, that happens when the fuel is cheaper than a bottle of soda.

I thought I was going to enjoy this video, but it kind of disgusted me. Cherry on top was screaming of rednecks at the end.

Yeah, that happens when the fuel is cheaper than a bottle of soda.

I thought I was going to enjoy this video, but it kind of disgusted me. Cherry on top was screaming of rednecks at the end.

Yeah tbh I didn't have headphones on while watching it, couldn't see much of a point
And that is why you need to secure oil reserves. Just imagine losing the freedom to do that.

nice.. just caught myself wondering 'how many struts they had to put on that thing'. enough ksp for today.

to the above, this is not an 'only in America' thing btw.. tractor pulling has become quite popular in europe over the last decades. stupidly overpowered but nice feats of engineering, just like that jet truck

The first thing in my head was...so THAT's what Jeb drives to work.

And honestly the second thought was...'meh needs SRBs...'

I need help, my sense of proportion has been seriously warped by this game.

Regards.

I always wondered about this tiny front wheels. Seriously, they need bigger front wheels. They look just so ridiculous with the rest beeing that big.

Edited August 25, 2014 by gpisic

nice.. just caught myself wondering 'how many struts they had to put on that thing'. enough ksp for today.

to the above, this is not an 'only in America' thing btw.. tractor pulling has become quite popular in europe over the last decades. stupidly overpowered but nice feats of engineering, just like that jet truck

http://www.bhznet.nl/fotos/diversen/2009/TractorPulling.jpg

Oh my Jeb, look at the exhaust on the second one.
I'm more concerned about the toxicity of all that unburnt hydrocarbons they are exhausting.
